title: Sketches from Nipal  historical and descriptive, with anecdotes of the court life and wild sports of the country in the time of Maharaja Jang Bahadur, G.C.B.  to which is added an essay on Nipalese Buddhism, and illustrations of religious monuments, architecture, and scenery, from the authors own drawings
creator: Oldfield, Henry Ambrose
